content:
The figure below shows a prism whose base is a $3\times 3$ square and whose height is $6$.   

![square prism vertical slice](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/94bf14f4775048a20e633abd42558d8e108ecfab.png)

**Drag the corners of the square below to draw the shape of a vertical slice through the prism.**   

Assume the vertical slice is parallel to one of the sides of the prism.
